:py:mod:`ExceptionSchema`
=========================

.. py:module:: ExceptionSchema


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   ExceptionSchema.SafeException




.. py:class:: SafeException

   Bases: :py:obj:`app.shared.schemas.ResponseSchemas.BaseResponse`

   Exception class for handling and sanitizing exceptions that occur during
   various operations such as loading and saving models, searches, and other operations.
